name: sonet-oralytics
description: AI-powered speech analytics that makes every word count

scripts.groundwork: node tools/pipelineGroundwork.js --raw data/raw --processed data/processed --chunks data/chunks --config configs/default.yaml
scripts.groundwork:fvad: npm run prep && set FVAD_FRAME_MS=20 && set FVAD_MODE=2 && npm run chunk:fvad
scripts.milestone:1: npm run prep && npm run chunk:fvad && npm run asr
scripts.align:prep: node tools/align/alignPrep.js --manifest data/chunks/chunks_manifest.jsonl --asr data/chunks/asr-summary.json --corpus data/align/corpus --dict data/align/dict --config configs/default.yaml
scripts.align:mfa: node tools/align/runAlignMFA.js --corpus data/align/corpus --dict data/align/dict/lexicon.txt --out data/align/textgrids --model english_mfa --config configs/default.yaml
scripts.milestone:2: npm run align:prep && npm run align:mfa && npm run align:parse
